statements: SELECT * FROM trending_topics;
SELECT topic_name, mentions_count FROM trending_topics ORDER BY mentions_count DESC;
SELECT topic_name, last_updated FROM trending_topics WHERE mentions_count > 100;
SELECT topic_name, mentions_count FROM trending_topics WHERE topic_id = 1;
SELECT topic_name, mentions_count, last_updated FROM trending_topics ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT topic_name, mentions_count FROM trending_topics ORDER BY mentions_count DESC, topic_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM trending_topics WHERE mentions_count > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT topic_name, last_updated FROM trending_topics WHERE topic_name LIKE 'T%' AND mentions_count BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY last_updated ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT topic_name, mentions_count, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM last_updated) AS month FROM trending_topics WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM last_updated) = 2022 GROUP BY month, topic_name, mentions_count ORDER BY month ASC, mentions_count DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM trending_topics WHERE mentions_count IS NOT NULL AND last_updated IS NOT NULL ORDER BY topic_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM trending_topics;
SELECT topic, mentions FROM trending_topics WHERE mentions > 100;
SELECT * FROM social_media_mentions WHERE platform='Twitter';
SELECT mention_topic, mention_date FROM social_media_mentions ORDER BY mention_date DESC;
SELECT id, topic, mentions FROM trending_topics WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM trending_topics ORDER BY mentions DESC;
SELECT topic, mentions FROM trending_topics WHERE mentions > 100;
SELECT * FROM social_media_mentions WHERE mention_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY mention_date DESC;
SELECT topic, SUM(mentions) AS total_mentions FROM trending_topics GROUP BY topic HAVING total_mentions > 500;
SELECT platform, COUNT(*) AS total_mentions FROM social_media_mentions GROUP BY platform ORDER BY total_mentions DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrendingTopics;
SELECT topic_name, trending_score FROM TrendingTopics ORDER BY trending_score DESC;
SELECT topic_name FROM TrendingTopics WHERE trending_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaMentions WHERE mention_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY mention_date DESC;
SELECT outlet_name, website_url FROM MediaOutlets;
SELECT * FROM TrendingTopics;
SELECT topic_name, trending_score FROM TrendingTopics ORDER BY topic_name ASC;
SELECT topic_id, topic_name, trending_score FROM TrendingTopics WHERE trending_score > 100 ORDER BY trending_score DESC;
SELECT t.topic_name, m.mention_text, m.mention_date FROM TrendingTopics t JOIN SocialMediaMentions m ON t.topic_id = m.topic_id;

SELECT o.outlet_name, o.social_media_handle, COUNT(m.mention_id) AS total_mentions FROM MediaOutlets o LEFT JOIN SocialMediaMentions m ON o.outlet_id = m.topic_id GROUP BY o.outlet_name ORDER BY total_mentions DESC;
SELECT * FROM trending_topics;
SELECT topic_name, trending_level FROM trending_topics ORDER BY trending_level DESC;
SELECT topic_name, trending_level FROM trending_topics WHERE trending_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM social_media_mentions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT outlet_name, location FROM media_outlets WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM trending_topics WHERE trending_level > 5;
SELECT topic_name, trending_level FROM trending_topics ORDER BY trending_level DESC;
SELECT topic_name, mention_text FROM trending_topics JOIN social_media_mentions ON trending_topics.id = social_media_mentions.topic_id;
SELECT outlet_name, location FROM media_outlets WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT topic_id, related_topic_id FROM topic_relationships WHERE topic_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM trending_topics;
SELECT topic_name, trending_score FROM trending_topics ORDER BY trending_score DESC;
SELECT id, topic_name FROM trending_topics WHERE trending_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM social_media_mentions WHERE mention_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT article_title, article_url FROM news_articles WHERE publication_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT topic_name, trending_score FROM trending_topics WHERE trending_score > 80;
SELECT topic_name, trending_score FROM trending_topics WHERE trending_score < 50 ORDER BY trending_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_mentions WHERE social_media_platform = 'Twitter' AND mention_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT article_title, article_url, publication_date FROM news_articles WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT topic_name, category_name FROM trending_topics JOIN topic_categories ON trending_topics.id = topic_categories.id;
